title: PGPD Announces Arrest in Murder on Terrace Drive
body:
Anyone with information about
this case is asked to call the Prince George’s County Police Department’s Homicide Unit at 301-772-4925. 
Callers wishing to remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411 TIPS
(8477), text “PGPD plus your message” to CRIMES (274637) on your cell phone or
go to  and submit a
tip online.
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
